name: Candy1
description: Candy is the dramatic tale of a female drug lord and her cohorts battling to maintain power in a big city. With respect from the streets and a crooked cop wanting them dead or alive, the only means of survival in the game is drugs, murder and dirty money.

name: Pocket Full of Game
description: A female gangster from Spanish Harlem commands respect for her loyalty, beauty and wealth before going deeper into the dangerous hustling game.

name: Final Kill
description: A mercenary embarks on an action-packed thrill ride when he is hired to protect a couple hiding out in Central America from a ruthless crime family.

name: Boss
description: A woman who's down on her luck takes the chance to score some quick cash, but she crosses the wrong man in the process and has to fight for her life.

name: Five-O
description: In a world where police brutality and corruption are at its peak, two Detroit cops, JP & Len Stacey must become apart of the problem in order to satisfy their personal needs.

name: Chained
description: A cautionary tale told about two women who decided to escape the poverty of 1980’s Spanish Harlem by climbing up the ladder of its darkest corners.
